page.title: 02HOUSING IN OUR AREA
page.content: The housing in Wickham Skeith and Stoke Ash is a mixture of old and new buildings.There are several interesting old buildings. There is a house in Wickham Skeith called Mill House.The doorsteps are millstones.It was built in 1648.The oldest house in the village is a farmhouse.In one of the bedrooms there is soot which has appeared on the wall because there used to be an old chimney stack there. In Stoke Ash there is a farm called Low Farm.When we did our survey there,we didn't knock on the door because we knew the people there had some black labradors! The oldest house is about 450 years old.The newest house was built in 1984. In Wickham Skeith there is a house which used to be a school.It closed in 1947.
